findings.title: Anyone can destroy Morphoâ€™s implementation
findings.description: An attacker is able to bypass the proxy and initialize the contract to trigger a call to selfdestruct, which would halt the system.

findings.title: High-severity issue in peer-to-peer lending market
findings.description: Delta will no longer be updated if the P2P lending market is disabled, causing the underlying Morpho account on Compound to be liquidatable

findings.title: Rounding errors vulnerability
findings.description: Areas of the codebase are vulnerable to rounding errors

findings.title: Rewards activation status issue
findings.description: Issues involving rewards activation status could allow an attacker to drain COMP rewards from every user or even to drain the incentives vault
